meanings.definition: A tropical plant of the arum family, cultivated for its starchy tuberous roots.
meanings.sent1: The yautia plant grows in warm regions.
meanings.sent2: People in the Caribbean enjoy eating yautia roots.
meanings.sent3: The yautia plant decided to grow taller than the other plants in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was as strong as the yautia roots.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the yautia plant stood out in the garden.

meanings.definition: The starchy tuberous root of the yautia plant, used as a food staple in the Caribbean.
meanings.sent1: Cooking yautia is a common practice in Caribbean households.
meanings.sent2: The market was bustling with vendors selling fresh yautia.
meanings.sent3: The yautia root rolled off the table and into the soup pot.
meanings.sent4: Her love for cooking was evident in the flavorful yautia dishes she prepared.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of roasted yautia filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
